headline: LED Lighting Market Growth Trends and Forecast Report 2025-2033 Featuring Acuity Brands, Koninklijke Philips, Emerson Electric, Hubbell, Daktronics, Dialight, LSI Industries, and Samsung
summary: The LED Lighting Market is set to soar, reaching an estimated value of $171.13 billion by 2033 from $71.74 billion in 2024, driven by a 10.14% CAGR. Key growth drivers include the demand for affordable, energy-efficient lighting solutions, heightened environmental awareness, and supportive government measures to reduce emissions. The global market will be influenced by advancements in product types (Lamps, Luminaires), applications (Indoor, Outdoor), and end-users (Commercial, Residential, Indus
